name: BIGSI
caption: BItsliced Genomic Signature Index
author: Phelim Bradley, Henk den Bakker, Eduardo Rocha, Gil McVean, Zamin Iqbal
description:
BIGSI can search a collection of raw (fastq/bam), contigs or assembly for genes, variant alleles and arbitrary sequence.
bioRxiv 234955; doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/234955

name: Bloom Filter
author: Benjamin Saljooghi
description: F# bloom filter implementation for fast DNA sequence comparison.

name: MaxBin
author: Yu-Wei Wu
description:
MaxBin is a software that is capable of clustering metagenomic contigs into different bins, each consists of contigs from one species. MaxBin uses the nucleotide composition information and contig abundance information to do achieve binning through an Expectation-Maximization algorithm.
Joint BioEnergy Institute, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

name: MetaBAT
author: Dongwan D. Kang1, Jeff Froula1, Rob Egan1, Zhong Wang
description: (2015) MetaBAT, an efficient tool for accurately reconstructing single genomes from complex microbial communities. PeerJ 3:e1165 https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.1165

name: MMseqs2
caption: Many-against-Many searching
author: Martin Steinegger
description:
MMseqs2 is a software suite to search and cluster huge protein sequence sets.
Steinegger M and Soeding J. MMseqs2 enables sensitive protein sequence searching for the analysis of massive data sets. Nature Biotechnology, doi: 10.1038/nbt.3988 (2017)
